content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment, Mr. Li. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 600 Euros per month. Can you offer me a rental price within that range?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates, I believe that a rental price of 600 Euros per month would be reasonable. However, I am open to discussing any potential negotiating points that you may have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you offer me a lower rental price?

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I hope you can offer a lower rental price.

I am willing to negotiate.

Please let me know the rental price you are proposing.

Thank you.

Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Li. While I understand your desire for a lower rental price, I am afraid that I am not able to offer any discounts at this time. The rental price of 600 Euros per month is based on the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates. However, I am always willing to discuss any potential negotiating points that you may have in mind. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
